name: Dishantar, Chiplun
briefDescription: We have been engaged in the process of social transformation of underprivileged community from remotest rural areas in Ratnagiri District.  Primary Activities: Tribal (Katkari) Community Development, Capacity Building of Adolescents, Women Empowerment, Health Care through camps and sustained follow up for serious cases needing surgeries, Natural Resource based Livelihood Enhancement, Replicable Small & Medium Livelihood Enhancement Model (Direct Beneficiaries: 5308 children between age group 5-19, 338 HHs, 438 women)
